title: Doping fluoride into ternary FeCoNi hydroxide electrocatalysts to boost oxygen evolution reaction
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE01241K, Communication
Wen-Ju Lu, Tzung-Wen Chiou
Developing high-current oxygen evolution reaction (OER) electrocatalysts with low overpotential, high conductivity, high active surface area, and high stability is an attractive yet challenging process. Herein, a ternary FeCoNi hydroxide-fluoride...
